Just teleporting wont work.[/quote]Do you have to get your post count up? I said Edit i fixed it and sorted it out myself, got nerds…

item.title: UnJail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Hi, well this is my code for unjailing, but i need it so when you do ::unjail PLAYERNAME it teles them back to home
coords: 3184, 3430

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.action = 0;
sM(“You have Unjailed “+p.playerName+”!”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to Unjail…”);
}
}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 09:37:53 pm[/size][hr]Edit: Don’t worry sorted it.

Read full topic
